Text: NDN Homeland Security Conference CallMonday Oct Cc The New Democrat Network invites its members to join us for a CONFERENCE CALL DISCUSSION OF HOMELAND SECURITY featuring THE HONORABLE ASHTON B CARTER A leading expert on homeland defense who will give us a better understanding of the challenges ahead in protecting against future terrorist attacks Current Advisor to the US Department of Defense and former Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Policy under President Clinton Professor at Harvards Kennedy School of Government and CoDirector of the HarvardStanford Preventative Defense Project which focuses on emerging threats to the United States such as nuclear chemical and biological weapons Author of Preventative Defense A New Security Strategy for America with former Defense Secretary William J Perry which former National Security Advisor Gen Brent Scowcroft called An essential guide to the critical choices that must be made as America rethinks potential threats to national security MONDAY OCTOBER th AM NOON EST Call in time AM Presentation to be followed by question and answer period INVITATION ONLY SPACES ARE LIMITED To register for this call email Stephanie Dorko by pm Thursday Oct th at and say you would like to participate She will respond with the conference call phone number and code Find out more about what New Democrats in Congress and around the nation are doing to address terrorism sign up for NDN News at wwwnewdemorgndnnews or visit wwwnewdemorg Contributions to the New Democrat Network are not tax deductible Paid for by the New Democrat Network
